title: Sales Development Representative (SDR)
job_overview:
Digital Flo isn't just another "AI agency" — we're engineers of AI-first client acquisition systems that think, speak, and convert like your best teaUpgrade to see actual infomber, 24/7. Our AI Social Flo System™ represents our conviction that true business freedom comes from intelligent systems that operate with precision, consistency, and relentless efficiency.
We don't build businesses to create jobs. We build businesses to create freedom — for ourselves and our clients.

We're looking for a tech-savvy, systems-oriented SDR who understands that the future isn't hiring more people—it's building smarter systems.

Key Responsibilities:
-Problem-First Qualification: Apply our Problem-First Doctrine to qualify prospects based on their operational pain points, not just industry labels
-Strategic Outreach: Craft personalized, high-impact outreach campaigns 
-System Optimization: Provide feedback to continuously improve our AI qualification and conversation systems
-Appointment Setting: Work with our AI agents to ensure qualified prospects are seamlessly moved to booked calls
-Data Analysis: Monitor performance metrics and suggest improvements to our client acquisition engine

Who We're Looking For:
Someone who values automation and systems over manual labor
A strategic thinker who can identify businesses with our specific pain point criteria:
-Lead leakage issues
-People-dependent operations
-Scaling limitations
-Brand inconsistency
An action-oriented professional who makes decisions based on value, not just cost
A clear communicator who can articulate complex value propositions

Requirements:
2+ years of sales development or related experience
Experience with CRM systems and sales automation tools
Demonstrated ability to qualify leads based on complex criteria
Strong analytical skills and data-driven decision making
Excellent written and verbal communication
Comfort with technology and willingness to learn new systems
Self-motivated with the ability to work independently

What Sets This Role Apart:
You won't be making hundreds of cold calls daily or sending generic templates. You'll be partnering with AI to work smarter:
Our AI handles initial outreach and follow-up at scale
You focus on strategic prospects and high-value conversations
You'll help train AI systems rather than being replaced by them
You'll work with businesses ready for transformation, not those resistant to change

Why Join Digital Flo:
Be at the forefront of AI-enhanced sales development
Work with a team that values systems thinking and innovation
Develop skills that position you for the future of sales
Compensation structure that rewards quality over quantity
Opportunity to influence the evolution of our AI systems

How to Apply:
Submit your resume and a short Loom intro video sharing your experience in the Sales Development role.
